trans-unit.source: --cached, --staged
-a, --autofix
-e, --external
-f, --file
-i, --internal
-o, --open
-p, --patch
-r, --root
-u, --update
A framework for style checking and linting
trans-unit.target: 一个风格检查和脱毛的框架

trans-unit.source: Advanced
Apply autofixes. This also does an update if the changes are external.
trans-unit.target: 应用自动修复。如果变化是外部的,这也会进行更新。

trans-unit.source: For more info on command line arguments use the --help command. The tools can be applied individually by executing the script files. Then the tools will loop over the whole project.
trans-unit.target: 有关命令行参数的更多信息，请使用 --help 命令。可以通过执行脚本文件来单独应用工具。然后，这些工具将遍历整个项目。

trans-unit.source: For spell checking a dictionary has to build. On first run you have to confirm to start this (or also if the dictionary file is not found).
trans-unit.target: 为了进行拼写检查,必须建立一个字典。在第一次运行时,你必须确认是否要启动这个程序(或者如果没有找到字典文件也可以)。

trans-unit.source: Its tools are applied on new or changed content which makes it fast and it allows a wider range of tools, because they can have false positives. For example style guide rules that have exceptions which can't be filtered out. Supported for versioning are SVN and Git (experimental).
trans-unit.target: 它的工具适用于新的或改变的内容,这使得它的速度很快,它允许更广泛的工具,因为它们可能会有假阳性。例如样式指南规则,有无法过滤掉的异常。支持的版本管理有SVN和Git(实验性)。

trans-unit.source: Monostyle
Monostyle has four modes:
Monostyle is a framework for documentation style checking and linting covering all parts of a style guide.
trans-unit.target: Monostyle是一个文档风格检查和绒毛的框架,涵盖了风格指南的所有部分。

trans-unit.source: Monostyle is build as a framework and not as a ready-made tool because the tools require customization like markup filtering or you might not want to use Chicago style title case. It includes its own RST parser and a port of the Reflow line wrapper. Its utilities can also be used for text editing with scripts.
trans-unit.target: Monostyle是作为框架构建的，而不是作为现成的工具构建的，因为该工具需要自定义设置（例如标记过滤），或者您可能不想使用Chicago样式的标题大小写。它包括自己的RST解析器和回流线包装器的端口。它的实用程序还可用于使用脚本进行文本编辑。

trans-unit.source: Open a file in a text editor if the report has a severity higher than specified. Please check if your editor of choice is available (else please make a I/PR to add it).
trans-unit.target: 如果报告的严重程度高于指定的程度,请用文本编辑器打开文件。请检查您选择的编辑器是否可用(否则请进行I/PR添加)。

trans-unit.source: Post processing:
Requirements: When using SVN the command line client tools need to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 要求。当使用SVN时,需要安装命令行客户端工具。

trans-unit.source: Running Monostyle
Running Monostyle does not replace building the project with Sphinx. Markup errors can lead to false negatives, so Monostyle has to be run again or the affected section has to be checked manually.
trans-unit.target: 运行Monostyle并不能取代用Sphinx构建项目。标记错误可能会导致错误的否定,所以必须再次运行Monostyle或者手动检查受影响的部分。

trans-unit.source: Set the diff cached option (Git only).
Setup
The dictionary has to be updated from time to time or after a new topic has been added to include new words (of cause the whole project has to be spell-checked). To do this run the spelling script:
trans-unit.target: 该词典必须不时更新，或者在添加新主题以包括新单词之后进行更新（因此，必须对整个项目进行拼写检查）。为此，请运行 spelling 脚本：

trans-unit.source: The root is the absolute path to the project directory or where the patch file was created. If not set the directory where Monostyle is run from is used as the root.
trans-unit.target: 根目录是指项目目录或创建补丁文件的绝对路径。如果没有设置,则使用Monostyle运行的目录作为根目录。

trans-unit.source: To check a file or directory.
To check changes in a patch-file.
trans-unit.target: 检查补丁文件中的变化。

trans-unit.source: To check changes made to the repository by others. Run this before you update your working copy with Git or SVN.
trans-unit.target: 检查其他人对版本库的修改。在你用 Git 或 SVN 更新你的工作副本之前,先执行这个。

trans-unit.source: To check your own changes (the default).
trans-unit.target: 要检查自己的变化(默认)。

trans-unit.source: Update the working copy.

You can set a commit/revision for internal, external and update (SVN only). With Git these are passed unaltered to diff. However, with SVN these can be colon separated or dash separated for the "change" syntax. When a side is omitted e.g. ":ARG" it will default to BASE (your working copy) on the left and on the right to HEAD (the latest revision in the repository). For external revisions the "change" syntax is used for single arguments "ARG".
trans-unit.target: 您可以为内部、外部和更新(仅SVN)设置提交/修订。在 Git 中,这些都是不加修改地传递给 diff 的,但在 SVN 中,这些都可以用冒号或破折号来分隔。然而,SVN的 "change "语法可以用冒号或破折号分隔。如果省略了":ARG",左边会默认为BASE(你的工作副本),右边会默认为HEAD(版本库中的最新版本)。对于外部修订,"change "语法用于单参数 "ARG"。
